document.full_text: houston astros pitcher aneury rodriguez was suspended three games for intentionally throwing at florida marlins batter gaby sanchez, major league baseball on tuesday.
document.title: astros' aneury rodriguez banned three games for hitting batter
lines_and_colors: houston astros pitcher aneury rodriguez was suspended three games for intentionally throwing at florida marlins batter gaby sanchez, major league baseball on tuesday.
